Bash(ENABLE_BROWSER_SCRAPING=1 CAMOUFOX_DEBUG=1 python -c "
from camoufox_scraper import run_camoufox_scraper, CAMOUFOX_AVAILABLE
import json

print\(''Testing Camoufox scraper with multiple search terms...''\)
print\(f''CAMOUFOX_AVAILABLE: {CAMOUFOX_AVAILABLE}''\)

# Test with a few search terms like CI would
test_terms = [''solar designer'', ''PV engineer'', ''photovoltaic'']

jobs_df, errors, attempts, diagnostics = run_camoufox_scraper\(
    search_terms=test_terms,
    sites=[''ziprecruiter''],  # Only ziprecruiter
    debug_screenshots=True
\)

print\(f''\\n=== RESULTS ===''\)
print\(f''Total jobs: {len\(jobs_df\)}''\)
print\(f''Total errors: {len\(errors\)}''\)
print\(f''Total attempts: {len\(attempts\)}''\)

print\(f''\\n=== ATTEMPTS DETAIL ===''\)
for a in attempts:
    print\(f""  {a.get\(''search_term''\)}: success={a.get\(''success''\)}, jobs={a.get\(''jobs_found''\)}, selector={a.get\(''selector_matched''\)}""\)

if errors:
    print\(f''\\n=== ERRORS ===''\)
    for e in errors:
        print\(f""  {e}""\)
")
